title: Inferno
description: Dray Khalkousa, a Chicago firefighter from a local fire hall, finds more than she bargained for when she meets a homeless woman, Abby Dean. An ardent affair soon deepens into a soul connection that neither woman can explain. As the layers of Dray's tormented heart are slowly peeled away, Abby realizes that she's not the only one who needs saving.
author: Trish Shields
